trans-unit.target: TEXT_HEAVNZ512_01847_SEQ_00<tab>Mogson looks like he's forgotten something again.

TEXT_HEAVNZ512_01847_SEQ_01<tab>It appears that the absent-minded Mogson has left his baskets behind again, this time in Tharl Oom Khash. Recover them for the poor moogle so he can stop fluttering about in distress.

TEXT_HEAVNZ512_01847_SEQ_02<tab>You find the baskets scattered around Tharl Oom Khash, and it is a mystery how the tiny moogle expected to carry them back in the first place. Return to Mogson and deliver his precious baskets back to him.

TEXT_HEAVNZ512_01847_SEQ_03<tab>Mogson is delighted to have the baskets returned to him, grateful that he can resume crafting with the crystals stored inside the baskets. It seems that a distant dragon's roar scared the moogle off while he was gathering the crystals. Now, thanks to you, the nervous moogle can resume crafting whatever it is he makes.
TEXT_HEAVNZ512_01847_MOGSON_000_000<tab>Oh no, I've done it again, kupo. I've forgotten my baskets! Please, adventurer, find them for me!
TEXT_HEAVNZ512_01847_MOGSON_000_001<tab>I forgot three baskets around Tharl Oom Khash. Find them before the monsters get into them!
TEXT_HEAVNZ512_01847_MOGSON_000_010<tab>Those baskets are precious to me. Find them around Tharl Oom Khash, kupo.
TEXT_HEAVNZ512_01847_MOGSON_000_020<tab>If I don't get those baskets back, this whole day will have been a waste, kupo! Were you able to recover them?
TEXT_HEAVNZ512_01847_MOGSON_000_021<tab>My baskets! Thank heavens you found them, kupo!
TEXT_HEAVNZ512_01847_MOGSON_000_032<tab>I went to Tharl Oom Khash to gather crystals for my crafting, but then I heard a dragon roar in the distance and ran off, leaving my baskets behind, kupo!
